title: # 353 - Daniel Sloss, Kai Humphries & ME
description:
Today I sit down and day drink cider for the first time with Daniel Sloss and Kai Humphries! We talk about Rugby, Daniel being a paintball referee, the airplane foot job, road rage, fighting, and much more!

For all of Daniel and Kai's tour dates go to www.Danielsloss.com or www.Kaihumphries.com 

This episode is brought to you by Fiverr. Get 10% off your first order by going to www.fiverr.com and use the code “Bertcast”

This episode is also brought to you by Shady Rays sunglasses. Use promo code “Bertcast50” for 50% off of two or more items in the shade shop. Go to www.shadyrays.com 

This episode is also brought to you by Zip Recruiter. Try Zip Recruiter for free today by going to www.ziprecruiter.com/bertcast  

This episode is also brought to you by Ring. Make your neighborhood safer with the neighbors app by Ring. Download for free today at www.ring.com/bertcast 

This episode is also brought to you by Clutter. Get $50 off your first month of on demand storage at www.clutter.com/bertcast and use code "Bertcast" at checkout.

This episode is also brought to you by Calm. Get 25% off of a Calm premium subscription by going to www.calm.com/bert  

The Body Shots Fall Tour is on pre sale now! Use the promo code “Shots” to get tickets at www.bertbertbert.com

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
To Follow me on..
Twitter: https://twitter.com/bertkreischer
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer
Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Akreischer
